0.text: Innate: After casting an ability, Lucian's next basic attack on-attack within 3.5 seconds fires an additional shot after 0.25 seconds, which deals 50 / 55 / 60% (based on level) AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against  minions.

1.text: The second shot applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

2.text: If Lucian's primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.

3.text: Innate - Vigilance: Whenever Lucian is  healed,  shielded or granted a buff by an ally, his next two shots within 6 seconds are empowered to deal 14 (+ 20% AD) bonus magic damage  on-hit. The empowered shots can stack up to 4 times and applies against structures.

0.text: Active: Lucian fires a laser in a line in the direction of the target enemy, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

Active: Lucian fires a missile in the target direction that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and granting  sight of the area for 1 second.

1.text: Enemies hit are marked for 6 seconds.

2.text: Lucian gains  bonus movement speed for 1 second when he or allied champions damage a marked target. Allied champions triggering this effect grant Lucian  Vigilance.

0.text: Passive: Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is  reduced by 1 second for each  Lightslinger shot hit, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy  champions.

1.text: Active: Lucian  dashes in the target direction.

2.text: Relentless Pursuit  resets Lucian's basic attack timer. Lucian can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Relentless Pursuit will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Lucian  channels for up to 3 seconds, rapidly firing up to 22 (+ 1 per 4% critical strike chance) shots in the target direction. Each shot deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against  minions. The Culling can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.

1.text: While channeling, Lucian is  ghosted and may still move and cast  Relentless Pursuit.
